HomePage.badge: Frontend Development with React.js and Next.js
HomePage.title: High-Impact Frontend Development
HomePage.subtitle: We create fast, reliable web applications with an exceptional user experience that drive your business growth.
HomePage.servicesSubtitle: Custom solutions to take your digital presence to the next level.
HomePage.portfolioSubtitle: A sample of our work and the impact we generate.
HomePage.aboutSubtitle: I am a passionate frontend developer dedicated to building modern, intuitive, and high-performance user interfaces. With years of experience in the React ecosystem, I specialize in transforming complex ideas into digital realities.
HomePage.aboutPoint2: Close collaboration with designers to create memorable user experiences.
HomePage.aboutPoint3: Obsessed with loading speed and frontend efficiency.
HomePage.contactSubtitle: Contact me for a free consultation. Let's talk about how I can help you achieve your goals.

Services.service1Desc: Professional online presence with high-performance static or dynamic sites.
Services.service2Desc: Destination pages optimized for speed and conversion in marketing campaigns.
Services.service3Desc: Internal tools, dashboards, and admin panels with React and Next.js.
Services.service4Desc: Improvement of speed, accessibility, and overall performance of existing websites.
Services.service5Desc: Updating slow sites to modern technologies like React and Next.js.
Services.service6Desc: Reusable component libraries to standardize styles and accelerate development.
Services.service7Desc: Connection with APIs, e-commerce, payment gateways, and authentication systems.
Services.service8Desc: Collaboration and outsourcing of frontend development for digital agencies.
Services.service9Desc: Incremental improvements, support, and post-delivery updates.

Projects.project1Desc: A data analysis platform for startups, with interactive visualizations and real-time performance.
Projects.project2Desc: High-conversion landing page for a new mobile app, achieving a 40% increase in downloads.
Projects.project3Desc: Online store with a minimalist design, Stripe integration, and a seamless shopping experience.

Testimonials.testimonial1Quote: The React Edge team transformed our idea into a functional and scalable web application. Their expertise in React is unmatched.
Testimonials.testimonial2Quote: The new landing page has exceeded all our expectations. The loading speed is incredible and conversions have skyrocketed.
Testimonials.testimonial3Quote: Working with them was a pleasure. They understood our vision perfectly and delivered a flawless and professional website.
